amendment.description: Amendment allows block grant funding to be used for mentoring programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 38 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to authorize block grant funding for programs to promote or develop partnerships with established mentoring programs to provide positive adult role models and meaningful activities for juvenile offenders, including violent juvenile offenders.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wilson amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
